nodes.text: This OOM command battle droid was stationed on General Grievous's Munificent-class star frigate around 21 BBY.
This battle droid served under General Grievous during the Bombing of the Coruscant power generator. He was ordered by Grievous to deliver the demolition droids to Coruscant.
The Droid was voiced by Matthew Wood, who voiced all the battle droids in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
